basics.name: Bharath Holla
basics.label: Associate Professor of Psychiatry
basics.summary: Dr. Holla is an Associate Professor of psychiatry at the National Institute of Mental Health and Neuro-Sciences (NIMHANS), Bengaluru, India. He completed postgraduate residency in psychiatry (2014) and post-doctoral fellowship in addiction medicine (2015) at NIMHANS. He received Wellcome-DBT India Alliance Clinical & Public Health Research Training Fellowship (2015-2018) and obtained his PhD in 2022 for his work on bridging Brain Imaging and Genetics of Addiction Vulnerability
